TITLE Vegetarian Chili

# In a large pot saute [1 item [chopped] onion] and [1 item red pepper].
# Add [2 cloves garlic[, minced]]; saute until fragrant.
# Add [6 oz tomato paste]; saute to bloom. 
# Stir in [1 tsp cumin], [1 tsp oregano], [1/2 tsp cayenne], [1/4 tsp ground chipotle], [3 tbl chili powder], [1 tsp salt], [1/2 tsp pepper].
# Add [56 oz tomato].
# Add [15 oz navy beans], [15 oz kidney beans], [15 oz black beans].
# Simmer for 30 minutes.
